name: Mood 2
description:
This is a very bad FPS game that I made in roughly 15 hours.  Mood 2 will get better over time, but right now it is quite bad. It features: 

  • Somewhat janky multiplayer,
  • Fully projectile-based gun logic;
  • 2 placeholder guns,
  • 20 player limit because I don't pay for servers,
  • Large amounts of bugs,
  • The most barebones graphics and interface known to man,
  • And a huge selection of 1 map!

If you would actually like to play this game when it is more complete, please say so in the comments. I hope you have fun with Mood 2!
